intro.title: A simple way to control your digital life
intro.feature3: Your data is private and secure
intro.disclaimer: *This app still in beta, expect the unexpected behavior and UI changes*

tutorial.task1: Tap the left checkbox to check
tutorial.task2: Tap the left checkbox to remove the check
tutorial.task3: Swipe left to delete this task
tutorial.task4: Tap the bottom right + to add a task
tutorial.task6: Tap the upper right ⁝ to edit or delete this list
tutorial.task7: There are other easy-to-use features, so please try them out!
tutorial.task8: That´s it for the tutorial. I hope this app will be useful to you
tutorial.task9: Thank you for using this app!

themes.title: Themes
themes.description: You can change the topic color here, this affects only things such as icons, buttons and other texts.

about.title: Tasking App
about.description: This is a free open source application developed for the community, focused on the management of tasks/notes/reminders in a simple way and without many additional functions.
